channel.title: Yilun Yang 杨逸伦
channel.description: Recent content on Yilun Yang 杨逸伦

item.description: Education PhD Student @ Max Planck Institute of Quantum Optics 05.2021 - Present MSc Theoretical and Mathematical Physics (with high distinction, Thesis) @         Ludwig-Maximilian University of Munich and Technical University of Munich 10.2019 - 04.2021 BSc Physics @ University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS) 09.2014 - 06.2018 Visiting student @ St Edmund Hall, University of Oxford 10.2017 - 03.2018 Awards Name Year Outstanding Undergraduate Thesis, UCAS 2018 China National Scholarship, Ministry of Education of People’s Republic of China 2017 Gold Medals, ACM ICPC Asia Regional , Dalian/Qingdao Regional 2016

Thermalization probes of many body systems by filtering Probing Thermalization through Spectral Analysis with Matrix Product Operators Yilun Yang, Sofyan Iblisdir, J. Ignacio Cirac, and Mari Carmen Bañuls , Phys. Rev. Lett. 124, 100602 (poster) Classical algorithms for many-body quantum systems at finite energies Yilun Yang, J. Ignacio Cirac, and Mari Carmen Bañuls, Phys. Rev. B 106, 024307(Editor’s suggestion) The thermal properties of many body systems at finite energies, or microcanonical ensemble, have subtle differences from those at finite temperatures, or the canonical ensemble, when the eigenstate thermalization hypothesis does not hold.
